thread.title: Concerned About Image? World Patent Marketing Announces The Development of 2 Face
thread.title_full: Concerned About Image? World Patent Marketing Announces The Development of 2 Face - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Concerned About Image? World Patent Marketing Announces The Development of 2 Face
text:
The New York Inventor Exchange approves the 2 Face for licensing and trading intellectual property rights.
Miami, FL (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
World Patent Marketing Miami , a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products, announces 2 Face, a technological invention that allows people to use two smart phones in one.
"Consumer Electronics Stores in the US make $77 billion a year," says Scott Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing and Desa Industries Inc. "While many consumers have been delaying appliance purchases and cutting back on discretionary electronic items, nobody scrimps on mobile phone purchases. It's a necessity, a status symbol, and a source of entertainment all in one. Demand for tablet computers and mobile devices will drive this industry's growth in the next five years."
“Technology is advancing at a very fast pace and it is most apparent in the race for the best smart phone,” says Cattya Bella, Executive Vice President for the World Patent Marketing Review Team. “These technological marvels have tons of features that people use every day. Some people use even two phones on a daily basis. However, this can become cumbersome at times. Fortunately, 2 Face is a technological invention that solves this problem by having two phones in one compact package.”
2 Face is a smart phone which contains two phones in one. With this technological invention, people will no longer have to bring two separate phones. This one phone has two sides and functions as two entirely separate phones. The phone doesn’t have a front side or back side as both sides are touch screen panels that act independently of one another. This is ideal for people who need to carry two phone numbers or have a separate work and personal number. For people who simply want to experience the freedom of having two mobile OS and platforms, this is also a great way to consume media and content.
“Businessmen and busy people often have dedicated business lines and personal phones,” says inventor Johnathan C. “2 Face saves them the trouble of having to bring a bag or to carry two bulky smart phones on the go. This also means that they are able to communicate and check their emails easily as they always have their phones with them no matter where they go. Simply flip this technological invention over and it’s time for work. Flip it back and you can call the kids while that presentation is downloading on the other side.”
Anthony Beckham, a sales agent and blogger from Mansfield, OH, has this to say about 2 Face: “People who need to continuously call and contact people for work have it rough. They always need to have their lines open as they never know when a prospective buyer might return a call. 2 Face is a technological invention that ensures that your business line is open while you call your kids or play a quick mobile game. This keeps the business line and personal line separate in theory but physically together for ease of use.”
2 Face is a technological invention geared towards the busy people in the business world and for tech aficionados that want to experience both sides of the mobile platform.
ABOUT WORLD PATENT MARKETING
World Patent Marketing is an innovation incubator and manufacturer of patented products for inventors and entrepreneurs. The company is broken into eight operating divisions: Research, Patents, Prototyping, Manufacturing, Retail, Web & Apps, Social Media and Capital Ventures.
World Patent Marketing is by your side every step of the way, utilizing our capital and experience to protect, prepare, and manufacture your new product idea and get it out to the market. The company sends representatives to trade shows every month in order to further advocate for its clients. It is just part of the World Patent Marketing cost of doing business .
WORLD PATENT MARKETING AWESOME REVIEWS
World Patent Marketing consumer complaints from clients are extremely rare, which is demonstrated by its A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and its five star ratings from consumer review sites including: Consumer Affairs, Google, Trustpilot, Customer Lobby, Reseller Ratings, Yelp and My3Cents.
World Patent Marketing is also a proud member of the National Association of Manufacturers, Duns and Bradstreet, the US Chamber of Commerce, the South Florida Chamber of Commerce, the Greater Miami Chamber of Commerce, the Association for Manufacturing Excellence, and the New York Inventor Exchange. Visit the worldpatentmarketing.com website. Contact us at (888) 926-8174 (US Eastern Time) or email bill(at)worldpatentmarketing(dot)com.
